'''OliveBSD''' is an [[OpenBSD]] [[LiveDistro]]. You can burn OliveBSD on a CD, put it in your computer and reboot: your computer will then be running the OpenBSD operating system, and have already running a graphical environment (using the [[IceWM]] [[X window manager|window manager]]) and be able to use selected applications straight away; all without any installation.
+
'''OliveBSD''' is an [[OpenBSD]] [[Live Distro]]. You can burn OliveBSD on a CD, put it in your computer and reboot: your computer will then be running the OpenBSD operating system, and have already running a graphical environment (using the [[IceWM]] [[X window manager|window manager]]) and be able to use selected applications straight away; all without any installation.
Now it seems it's not maintained (based on version 3.8)
Now it seems it's not maintained (based on version 3.8)
